I just had 3.0M6 die on me twice, and this is the same stack trace I see in the
log file. My scenario was doing some things outside of eclipse, going back to
eclipse and performing a refresh of the project, then simply trying to click on
a file in the package explorer. Eclipse simply died. This was on Windows 2000.

Dunno if the severity and/or priority should be boosted; wait and see if others
have it die on them too, or if continue to for me and see that in the log file.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 49576 ***
